fields.name: :one:
fields.value:
Use correct channels for what you are posting 
(Check Channel Description)

fields.name: :two:
fields.value: No loud noises or music played through your microphone!

fields.name: :four:
fields.value: No advertisement or selling of products!

fields.name: :six:
fields.value: If you're streaming while in chat, you MUST have a `#` next to your name!

fields.name: :seven:
fields.value: No offensive or inappropriate remarks or song requests!

fields.name: :eight:
fields.value: No abusive talk to admins or moderators (They are here to help)!

fields.name: :nine:
fields.value: No NSFW content! NSFW memes are allowed in <#786594678505603082> but they must be memes!

fields.name: :one::zero:
fields.value: Your account MUST comply with the Discord [Terms of Service](https://discord.com/terms)! Must be 13-years-old or older.
